casebody.data:
2001-3341 (La. 10/14/02)

Lawrence MOORE v. Terry WARE, Chairman of the West Monroe Fire and Police Civil Service Board. No. 2001-C-3341. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re West Monroe Fire & Police Service Board; West Monroe City of;—Defendants); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Ouachita, 4th Judicial District Court Div. A, Nos. 98-2076, *40900-1016; to the Court of Appeal, Second Circuit, No(s). 35,275-CA, 35,276-CA.

Granted.
